column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I usually don't gravitate towards deep dish
column3: you gotta.  All of my Chi-town friends said to go to Lou's
column4: and I see why.  It was great!  The crust
column7: and maintained its crispiness even on the bottom underneath all the sauce.  Speaking of the sauce
column10: and the right amount.  I was afraid the cheese would be too much
column11: but the balance between it and the sauce was perfect.  The personal size was a good amount
column13: and the bf had one slice leftover from the small size.  So
column14: I wouldn't say I'm converted to Team Deep Dish
column16: this is a great choice for a tasty deep dish pizza meal.
